def Load(widget): import clr clr.AddReference("Benner.Corporativo.Definicoes") from Benner.Corporativo.Definicoes.Contratos import CNContratoAditivo
from Benner.Tecnologia.Common import FieldDefinition registro = widget.Entity if registro == None: return
contratoAprovado = CNContratoAditivo.ContratoAprovado(long(registro.Fields["CONTRATO"].Handle.Value))
widget.View.Commands["New"].Visible = contratoAprovado widget.View.Commands["Edit"].Visible = contratoAprovado widget.View.Commands["Delete"].Visible = contratoAprovado
if (contratoAprovado): status = int(registro.Fields["STATUS"].Value) statusEmElaboracao = 1 if status != statusEmElaboracao: widget.View.Commands["Edit"].Visible = False widget.View.Commands["Delete"].Visible = False
agrupamentoFuncoes = widget.View.Commands["GRP_FUNCOES"] if agrupamentoFuncoes != None and agrupamentoFuncoes.Items["AcompanharAssinaturasDigitais"] != None: agrupamentoFuncoes.Items["AcompanharAssinaturasDigitais"].Visible = registro.ExibirComandoAcompanharAssinaturasDigitais
